5fcc2c0a-efe2-43de-9f5a-5c40ad5eb7e7.description: Earners of this Certification must demonstrate practical skills in the basic capabilities of the Ataccama ONE Data Quality & Governance Suite. 3dd944a7-e2da-4ed6-b1fc-211fd872f341.description: Earners of this badge understand the advanced capabilities of the Ataccama ONE Gen2 platform. How to configure event notifications and integrate with 3rd party applications to federate data for post-processing. They also understand how to leverage GraphQL to perform a bulk activity to support their Data Quality & Governance initiatives. Understand how to implement fuzzy matching and steps to optimize the performance of their MDM implementation.
3dd944a7-e2da-4ed6-b1fc-211fd872f341.name: Data People Summit '22 | Advanced Training

b3187eb9-d9f8-4ec1-8874-bf64e354ec07.description: Earners of this badge must attend Ataccama training on the foundational capabilities of the Ataccama ONE Master Data Management Suite. They learn how Master and Reference Data Management principles are managed within Ataccama ONE via hands-on labs from certified trainers. The training course covers the following topics: The Ataccama ONE Server ONE Web App Integration Patterns Modelling Workflows Scheduler Cleansing, Matching, Aggregation Hierarchies, Views, Relationships Business Workflows.
b3187eb9-d9f8-4ec1-8874-bf64e354ec07.name: Ataccama ONE v13 Trained Professional MDM - Onboarding Training
